nodes.text: Lyxas Sor was a Force-sensitive female individual who was active during the Imperial Era and was a master of Form II combat. Sor was a once-renowned lightfoil duelist and had won the Tapani Open tournament. As the winner, Sor was awarded prize money as well as a noble title and land on the House Reena-controlled world of Caloria, off of the Caloria Run. After her victory, she immediately retired, with many believing that she was living off her prize money.
